thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Bruce
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Bruce

author: Bruce
title: Bruce
text:
Mary ( your phone Rep ) was very helpful, cheerful and a very good communicator. Helped me with a minor IT issue and even gave me a seniors discount!
Insurance should be simple and Mary certainly explained how my policy worked- well done.
I will tell friends and family about your product and service ethic.
I have not yet had a situation where I need to lodge a claim but assume it would be handled in the same efficient manner as above.
Kind regards,
Bruce James
